FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 290 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 Natagar 2019 g ANALEMMA, by Half Ours. Winner at 2 and 3, $33,477. Sent from United States to Saudi Arabia in 2020.
